getInvitationType().Description: Retrieve the type of this @B_com#google#android#gms#games#multiplayer#Invitation_E@. May be either @B_com#google#android#gms#games#multiplayer#Invitation#INVITATION_TYPE_REAL_TIME_E@ or @B_com#google#android#gms#games#multiplayer#Invitation#INVITATION_TYPE_TURN_BASED_E@.

Returns: The server timestamp at which this @B_com#google#android#gms#games#multiplayer#Invitation_E@ was created.
getCreationTimestamp().Description: Retrieve the server timestamp at which this @B_com#google#android#gms#games#multiplayer#Invitation_E@ was created.

Returns: The maximum number of additional players that can be added to this game.
getAvailableAutoMatchSlots().Description: Return the maximum number of available automatch slots for this invitation. If automatch criteria were not specified during creation, or if all slots have been filled, this will return 0.

Returns: Variant specified for this invitation, if any.
getVariant().Description: Retrieve the variant specified for this @B_com#google#android#gms#games#multiplayer#Invitation_E@, if any. A variant is an optional developer-controlled parameter describing the type of game to play. If specified, this value will be a positive integer. If this invitation had no variant specified, returns @B_com#google#android#gms#games#multiplayer#realtime#Room#ROOM_VARIANT_DEFAULT_E@ or @B_com#google#android#gms#games#multiplayer#turnbased#TurnBasedMatch#MATCH_VARIANT_DEFAULT_E@.

getGame().Description: Retrieve the @B_com#google#android#gms#games#Game_E@ object that this @B_com#google#android#gms#games#multiplayer#Invitation_E@ is associated with.

ClassDesc: Data interface for an invitation object.
